display_long_description:
SimLab VR Viewer lets you step inside immersive VR scenes created with SimLab Composer and SimLab VR Studio. These tools convert 3D models from over 30 popular file formats into fully interactive VR experiences that you can view and explore with your headset.
⚠️ Please note:  3D files such as FBX, OBJ, or USDZ must first be prepared in SimLab Composer or VR Studio before being viewed. Direct import into the Viewer is not available.
What You Can Do
    • Run complete VR training and educational simulations.
    • Explore mechanical assemblies and interact with 3D objects.
    • Deliver hands-on training and immersive learning experiences.
    • Take measurements and attach notes for review and collaboration.
    • Join cross-platform multi-user sessions to collaborate and communicate in real time, whether in VR, Desktop or mobile.
    • Wireless Sync – Connect your headset with SimLab Composer or VR Studio to transfer and update VR experiences without cables.
Who Is It For?
    • Architects & Engineers – Present and review designs in VR.
    • Educators & Trainers – Deliver engaging, interactive lessons and simulations.
    • Designers & Marketers – Showcase prototypes and products in virtual space.
    • Teams – Review projects collaboratively in VR.
👉 To start creating VR experiences, visit:
           https://www.simlab-soft.com/3d-products/simlab-composer-main.aspx
